title: Dave Quiggle, professional artist
itunes:title: Dave Quiggle, professional artist
description:
I travelled out to the hot desert of Temecula to meet and hang out with professional artist Dave Quiggle. He's done some of your favorite record covers from Sick Of It All and Shai Hulud to artwork for Disney and Pee Wee Herman. We had a great chat in his home office about being an introvert, working at Facedown Records and being a father. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com. Please donate to the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
